main event: A bright white light passed directly overhead in Belaire, New York.
interesting points: The light could have been a spotlight, but the information is not sufficient to form a valid conclusion.
The sighting was reported on January 3, 1959.
The location of Belaire, New York is approximately 15 miles west of Mitchell AFB.
The airdrome officer stated there was a possibility the sighting could have been of 'Premier lights' which are frequently used in the area for advertising purposes.
